column2: Creamy rice pudding flavored with coconut and spices, served warm with a sprinkle of toasted coconut flakes.
A refreshing scoop of mango sorbet, perfect for hot days or as a palate cleanser between courses.
A traditional Jamaican dessert made with sweet guava filling and flaky pastry crust, served warm with a dollop of whipped cream.
Moist sweet potato cake soaked in a spiced rum syrup, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and caramel sauce.
